mapper.sql: id, bill_no, balance_no, company_no, company_name, mall_no, mall_name, shop_no, short_name, full_name, month, balance_start_date, balance_end_date, brand_no, brand_name, category_no, category_name, sale_qty, sale_amount, billing_amount, prepayment_amount, used_prepayment_amount, system_deduct_amount, balance_deduct_amount, balance_diff_amount, deduct_amount, diff_amount, sys_deduct_amount, change_amount, zone_yyyymm, sharding_flag,saler_no, saler_name, buyer_no, buyer_name, mall_number_amount,sales_diffamount,expense_operate_amount
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM bill_shop_balance_cate_sum WHERE 1=1
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT brand_no) AS brand_no ,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT brand_name) AS brand_name FROM bill_shop_balance_cate_sum WHERE 1=1
SELECT DISTINCT brand_no , brand_name FROM bill_shop_balance_cate_sum WHERE 1=1
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) as saleAmount FROM bill_shop_balance_cate_sum WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: /*sharding_flag*/ UPDATE bill_shop_balance_cate_sum a, bill_shop_balance b, ( SELECT c.balance_no, MAX(c.sale_amount) max_sale, sum(ROUND(c.billing_amount, 2)) sum_billing_amount FROM bill_shop_balance_cate_sum c GROUP BY c.balance_no ) d SET a.billing_amount = a.billing_amount + (b.mall_billing_amount-d.sum_billing_amount) WHERE 1=1 AND a.balance_no = b.balance_no AND a.balance_no = d.balance_no AND a.balance_no = #{params.balanceNo} AND a.sale_amount = d.max_sale

/*sharding_flag*/ UPDATE bill_shop_balance_brand a, bill_shop_balance b, ( SELECT c.balance_no, MAX(c.sales_amount) max_sale, sum(ROUND(c.mall_billing_amount, 2)) sum_billing_amount FROM bill_shop_balance_brand c GROUP BY c.balance_no ) d SET a.mall_billing_amount = a.mall_billing_amount + (b.mall_billing_amount-d.sum_billing_amount) WHERE 1=1 AND a.balance_no = b.balance_no AND a.balance_no = d.balance_no AND a.balance_no = #{params.balanceNo} AND a.sales_amount = d.max_sale
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(sale_amount) as total_sale_amount, SUM(sale_qty) total_sale_qty, SUM(billing_amount) total_billing_amount, SUM(prepayment_amount) total_prepayment_amount, SUM(diff_amount) total_diff_amount, SUM(system_deduct_amount) total_systemdeduct_amount, SUM(balance_deduct_amount) total_balancededuct_amount, SUM(balance_diff_amount) total_balancediff_amount, SUM(deduct_amount) total_deduct_amount FROM bill_shop_balance_cate_sum WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bill_shop_balance_cate_sum (id, bill_no, balance_no, company_no, company_name, mall_no, mall_name, shop_no, short_name, full_name, month, balance_start_date, balance_end_date, brand_no, brand_name, category_no, category_name, sale_qty, sale_amount, billing_amount, prepayment_amount, used_prepayment_amount, system_deduct_amount, balance_deduct_amount, balance_diff_amount, deduct_amount, diff_amount, sys_deduct_amount, change_amount, zone_yyyymm, sharding_flag,saler_no, saler_name, buyer_no, buyer_name,mall_number_amount,sales_diffamount,expense_operate_amount ) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{balanceNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mallNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mallName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{balanceStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{balanceEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{billingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prepaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{usedPrepaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{systemDeductAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balanceDeductAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balanceDiffAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diffAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sysDeductAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{changeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zoneYyyymm,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{shardingFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{salerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{salerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mallNumberAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salesDiffamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expenseOperateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
